website_summaries.verdict: If you need a portable gimbal for light professional filming with a DSLR - or, perhaps more likely, to step up the quality of your hobbyist filming or YouTubing - the Weebill-S is a solid shout.

customer_reviews.title: Mixed
customer_reviews.text: Ok, seems to wotk well, when it does. However, it does alot of complaining and doesnt "gimble" if your camera isnt perfectly balanced to begin with. Takes 18650 batteries which ran out after being fully charged after about 2 hours use, so if you're going filming for the day, you'll need a few more. Hard to find exact ones, but I eventually found some for about £10 each. Will I get a different one. Probably. Will I keep this. Maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer 1234

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Canon 7D ii
customer_reviews.text: The reviews where very good and it was recommended highly by a friend. So I bought the weebill s with focus controller. When it was delivered it was very well packed and everything looked sturdy. Unfortunately I did not realise that there is no cable available that is compatible with the Canon 7D ii. Devastated to have it returned
customer_reviews.author: kim Bainbridge

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of kit to really improve your film making
customer_reviews.text: I shoot a lot of handheld exercise videos where I'm having to track moving subjects and the Weebill S has made my life so much easier whilst at the same time hugely improved the quality of the footage I'm able to produce. It opens up a huge array of creative possibilities which I'm only just discovering and really looking forward to exploring. It's also very compact and when coupled with a mirrorless camera like the Sony A7iii makes for a very compact set up. For the money it's great value and will hugely improve your film making. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: "dan-w"

customer_reviews.title: First impressions, fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: First impressions this little gimbal seems like the perfect companion for shooting weddings. I’m using my Sony A6300 and the 16-35 gmaster. I previously owned a Ronin S and the Weebill is so much lighter and quicker to balance with the locks. It literally took me 2 minutes to balance the first time and no horizon drift unlike other gimbals. So far I’m really pleased with this gimbal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zhiyun Weebill S Gimbal
customer_reviews.text: An extremely well-thought-out gimbal with good ergonomics. Build quality is very good and works well with my Sony A6000 camera to produce some lovely cinematic footage. Very portable and compact with its size with lockable arms. Two main reasons, why I purchase this gimbal over others was 1) can use heavier camera’s and Len’s (motors strong) 2) Very compact in size 3) Control settings within the gimbal itself. Overall a very well-designed gimbal and key bit of equipment for any filming enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Most awesome purchase for cinematography enthusiasts. The seller is super efficient. It was ordered on a Saturday , got confirmed on Monday, received the item by Wednesday. I'm pretty happy with the delivery service. Product is sturdy, legit and overall overwhelming, Physical Quick guide inside the package with Detailed Uset Manual on the product manufacturer App. Setting it up is very interesting. Overall satisfied customer here.
customer_reviews.author: emalbao

customer_reviews.title: Not great for eliminating step vibration
customer_reviews.text: I do like the feel of it however. It felt heave afrer a little usage. My camera only weighs around 600g so this was probably a bit overkill. Unfortunately, the vibrations when walking is still visible and that is the only reason I'm sending it back. Otherwise its pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rm Uys

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gimbal!
customer_reviews.text: Having owned both Crane V2 and Weebill LAB I can easily say that this is the best gimbal from Zhiyun so far! Still lacking support for Sony cameras, but the strong motors and easy to use-modes makes this product a must have for all film makers.
customer_reviews.author: Tue Schmidt Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gimbal for travelling
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a gimbal which you can take everywhere then I can recommend this gimbal. Quality is very good, easy to balance.
customer_reviews.author: KLSETTER

customer_reviews.title: Best Gimbal at it's Price Point
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this the best gimbal on the market at it's price point, but Zhiyun's customer service is absolutely fantastic! Helen has gone above and beyond to help with my order and is the epitome of outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great compact gimbal
customer_reviews.text: Great gimbal. Easy to balance and works with a heavy setup. Got it balanced perfectly with my gh5 and sigma 18-35. I had to mount the camera to my metabones adapter though, as when it’s mounted to the camera, it is too front heavy. This could be solved with some counter weight though. Still works great just mounted to the metabones though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful! Perfect combo! Highly recomended!
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent gimbal! Especially if you consider the form factor! Very smooth performance and really easy to use for beginners! I am using it with the EOS R and the 24-105 ef with the adapter and it handles it perfectly! Very strong motors! Also I love how portable it is!
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Zisis

customer_reviews.title: It's very compact and very powerful..! And works very smooth!
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting long time for something that compact and strong..! Easy to Cary around! Through it to you bag and ready to go..! Everything works perfect..! And I'm very happy with this purchase!highly recommended to everyone that want something compact and powerful!
customer_reviews.author: Georgios bampoukos

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Is just perfect, size, smooth, easy to set up, and well built
customer_reviews.author: maurorocha

customer_reviews.title: The gimbal I’ve been waiting for.
customer_reviews.text: I love the small size of this gimbal, and that it balances a Sony a7iii and 24-70 GM lens!
customer_reviews.author: SpencerH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my first gimbal to buy and I found it easy to use, straight out of the box no complications
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A well worthy piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, easy to use, sturdy solid feel.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Samantha W Tong

customer_reviews.title: Two so far that just did not function
customer_reviews.text: If this worked it would be great, but it just doesn't. Even with a Sony AX53 video camera, smaller than pretty much any SLR, there is a runaway vibration in the tilt motor that just about shakes the thing to pieces, and the camera, and the footage, of course. See the video for details. Maybe this is a bad batch, but I am trying one more and then going for a DJI alternative. Buy cheap, buy twice, as is often said. In my case, it will be three times, but that's the lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. Poole

customer_reviews.title: Struggled with opening battery door
customer_reviews.text: So hard to open the battery door. I didn't know you have to remove the battery to charge the battery and that too was okay if the battery door was easy to open. Look at my hands hurt after trying to open the battery door. Someone please suggest an easy way to open it or any equipment to open it
customer_reviews.author: Shijo C T

customer_reviews.title: Not as smooth as i tough
customer_reviews.text: No good steady with normal cameras the steadiness still not great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gimbal
customer_reviews.text: It's light but has pritty strong power which fits well with my nikon z6! Strongly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Zhenyao

product_meta.title: Zhiyun WEEBILL-S Official 3-Axis Gimbal Stabilizer for DSLR Cameras, Mirrorless Cameras with Lens Combos
feature_bullets: WEEBILL-S comatible with mainstream mirrorless and DSLR camera & lens combos. Combos like Sony A7Ⅲ+FE 24-70mm F2.8 and Canon 5D4+EF 24-70mm F2.8 can be perfectly balanced and stabilized for smooth cinematic shots under different scenarios
Compact size as A4 paper; Ergonomically designed Sling mode to save effort and provide comfortable underslung shooting experience
8th Instune algorithm provides high responsiveness and eliminates jittery in fast movement in any environment
14 hours battery life; Brand new TransMount Image Transmission Module (accessory) to offer 1080P 30fps highly synchronised transmission and up to 3 screen receivers
Dual focus control system; Quick release system; OLED display

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars138 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
